group_1.narration: I loved the setting sun.
It shone so brightly, as though it wanted@to leave proof that it was there.
That's why I liked it.
That apartment complex...@I loved its rooftop.@It was my secret base.@There, I had the panorama all to myself.
That's why I liked it.
So maybe it was inevitable@that I would spend my last moments@gazing at the sunset from that rooftop.
That was when I became a Witch.
It was the consequence of me@using my magic day in and day out,@blackening my Soul Gem beyond@what it could handle…
But during that time,@I had no idea what had happened to me,@and I was overwhelmed with fear and pain.
Even with all that going on, though,@the sunset was gorgeous... @This town…no, the whole world@was dyed in glittering gold.
Only at the very end did I realize…@just how beautiful the world is.
If we had fully faced our pain and sadness,@and not averted ourselves from it...
We might have realized this beauty@while we still had a chance to begin anew.
It devastated me.
…And then I heard a voice.
The voice of a curse that resented@everything in the world, or maybe the voice@of an earnest wish desiring its destruction...
The moment that voice reached me,@the town that should have looked so beautiful@suddenly turned hideous.
Why am I about to disappear?@Why does the world look so beautiful,@as though it's celebrating my death?
Does it wish I'd never been born at all?
All I ever wanted was to@be normal and live happily here...@but I wasn't allowed even that,@and I was treated so horribly.
I hate it!@I hate all that beauty.@It represents everything I couldn't have.@I hate it... I want to erase it.
I want to erase this world,@this hateful city that made me@the way that I am.
I want to live to make that come true.
[textBlack:As soon as that thought came to me,@my power came into bloom,@allowing me to transplant my persona@into another person.]
[textBlack:By using that power to@escape into my friend, Hanna,@who was by my side at that moment,@I was able to keep being myself.]
Put another way,@even though I'd become a Witch,@my persona was able to remain intact@by becoming a parasite of sorts@that could latch onto other people...
Still, despite being separated from@the Witch, I'm still an aspect of it.@ It might be the case that my transformed soul@brought forth my desire to destroy Kamihama.
In this way, I had changed:@just like the once-beautiful sight@of the evening was now painted@over with hatred.
I had a feeling that everything@would become dyed in hatred@from that point on.
Inevitably, my persona would transform@into a Witch as well…
ーMikotoー@But…being inside Hanna was warm.
ーMikotoー@Warm light shined over me, softening my hatred.
ーMikotoー@That sunlight shone brightly,
ーMikotoー@and like a mirror, it was reflecting something.

group_1.textRight: I'm a Magical Girl, and I'm assuming...@you are too?

group_1.narration: Is this…Hanna's memory@of when we first met?

group_1.textLeft: But your magic's the best to use.

group_1.narration: Right, this is how I learned that Hanna@had "overwrite" magic…
I remember we used to talk about magic@and the future in this shop.
We went to many places together@during our Witch hunts.
I did meet another Magical Girl,@but I felt most comfortable@when it was just us.
We always did so many things together.
We kept an exchange diary, even.
We bought matching pens, too!
…Well, I was basically the one who pushed it.
Hanna acted like she hated it,@but I thought it was cute.
*Giggle*
ーMikotoー@...Those days are the only thing I don't want@to be tarnished by hatred.
ーMikotoー@I didn't understand how precious those days were,@so I want to cherish them now.
ーMikotoー@When those images of Hanna came to mind,@I felt my desire for destruction waver.
ーMikotoー@Is it because I'm just a persona,@leaving me in an incomplete state?
ーMikotoー@Or is it…Hanna's way of protecting me?
ーMikotoー@..Hanna…I'm right here, you know…?
ーMikotoー@I'm inside Hanna, as close as I can be to her,
ーMikotoー@and yet I can't even talk to her,
ーMikotoー@let alone see her face again…
ーMikotoー@I want to tell you so many things, Hanna…
ーMikotoー@Hanna… Hanna…!
ーMikotoー@I, Mikoto Sena, am still here…!
[textBlack:"...There you are."]

group_1.textRight: I've been lookin' for you for a long time, Sena.
